Text:
Superb movie,
A=10
V=10
The quality is great even on large 1080 hi def screen.

This is a timeless movie and also the last one done in the classic animation style so defiantly one for the collection and a highly moving story.
Awesome! Looking forward to seeing this one!

Thank you so much! I used VLC to play this file and to my surprise, there were English subtitles soft encoded :)

A: 10
V: 10
English subs: 10
BACK IN THE DAY FILM! LOVE IT, DOWNLOADING AND SEEDING.
